item.title: About
item.description: Long ago, in a “previous life” both of us were medical laboratory professionals. Mixing reagents and growing bugs was something that I really enjoyed. Software development challenges and pay lured me away from the laboratory, but I have always sort of missed the precision of measuring, mixing, and testing. When I would yen for tgit he good ol’ days in the lab, Silvia would suggest that I start home brewing beer.
